scripts.start: cross-env LOGGING_CONSOLE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_FILE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_DB_LEVEL=error LOGGING_SAVE_REQUESTS=true LOGGING_USE_DB=false nodemon server.js
scripts.test: cross-env IN_TEST=true PORT=5000 LOGGING_CONSOLE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_FILE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_DB_LEVEL=error LOGGING_SAVE_REQUESTS=true LOGGING_USE_DB=false istanbul cover --reporter=html ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive --timeout 120000
